Class CountFunction<T extends SequenceElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.spark.models.sequencevectors.functions.CountFunction<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.spark.api.java.function.Function<Sequence<T>,Pair<Sequence<T>,java.lang.Long>>

    public class CountFunction<T extends SequenceElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.spark.api.java.function.Function<Sequence<T>,Pair<Sequence<T>,java.lang.Long>>
    This accumulator function does count individual elements, using provided Accumulator
